Intro.synopsis: Character Creation dialog for Avatar Wyll
Intro.how_to_trigger: Select the character as an avatar in character creation and click the button that plays their voiced character description

Intro_3.speaker: Origin_Intro_Wyll
Intro_3.text: Seven years ago, I was exiled from Baldur's Gate, the city I call home.

Intro_0.speaker: Origin_Intro_Wyll
Intro_0.text: My name is Wyll, but the people of the Sword Coast call me the Blade of Frontiers - champion of the meek, defender of the innocent.

Intro_2.speaker: Origin_Intro_Wyll
Intro_2.text: The truth isn't quite so simple, but they're right about one thing. I hunt monsters, and I always catch my prey.

Intro_1.speaker: Origin_Intro_Wyll
Intro_1.text: My latest target is a devil, and I'm right on her tail. Once I'm through with her, she'll never escape the fires of the first hell.
